channel.title: Engadget
channel.description: Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2021 Yahoo! Inc. All rights reserved

item.title: Western Digital blames malware for My Book Live devices being wiped remotely
item.description: Western Digital My Book Live cloud storage devices are being wiped remotely.

item.title: Google Fi’s VPN service is rolling out to subscribers with iPhones
item.description: While Google has narrowly missed its original timeline, it's now starting to roll out its Fi VPN service to Apple phones on its MVNO network.

item.title: TCL's OLED wearable display will finally launch next month
item.description: TCL is finally releasing its wearable display, called the Nxtwear G, next month.

item.title: 'The Sims 4' is hosting a (partly Simlish) music festival
item.description: Starting on June 29th, EA will host a music festival inside of the Sims 4 that will feature pop star Bebe Rexha, one part of indie band Glass Animals and singer-songwriter Joy Oladokun.

item.title: Amazon is adding 'DIRT 5' and 'Saints Row The Third' to its Luna+ game library
item.description: Amazon is adding DIRT 5, Saints Row The Third: Remastered and Valkyria Chronicles 4 to the Luna+ channel in July.

item.title: Watch the Windows 11 event in under 8 minutes
item.description: Get a closer look at the future of Windows.

item.title: The Steam Summer Sale is live with deals on thousands of games
item.description: Save on 'Mass Effect Legendary Edition,' 'Cyberpunk 2077' and many other titles.

item.title: Intel's Bridge technology will allow Android apps to run natively on Windows 11
item.description: Intel says Bridge is a runtime post-compiler that allows applications that were originally designed for a variety of different hardware platforms to run natively on x86 devices.

item.title: ThermoWorks' latest Thermapen can measure food temperature in under one second
item.description: ThermoWorks has unveiled a new cooking thermometer that gets the temperature in just one second — ideal if you're in a rush.

item.title: Instagram tests posting photos from your desktop
item.description: Instagram is testing allowing feed posts from desktop browsers, a first for the company.

item.title: Microsoft Store is getting a much-needed overhaul for Windows 11
item.description: Microsoft won't take a cut of in-app purchases if developers use their own payment systems.

item.title: Android apps are coming to Windows 11
item.description: At the Windows 11 event today, Microsoft announced Android apps will work in the next OS.

item.title: Microsoft Teams is integrated into the Windows 11 taskbar
item.description: As you are surely aware, the importance of online communications platforms skyrocketed over the last year-plus, thanks to the COVID-19 pandemic. Microsoft has pushed its Teams communication platform in a big way during that time, and it'll be even more prominent in Windows 11

item.title: Microsoft unveils Windows 11, a more polished OS
item.description: Windows 11 is a more polished spin on Windows 10.

item.title: This $160 bundle including Rosetta Stone makes traveling cheaper and more rewarding
item.description: This bundle contains resources that give you the info and skills you need for more fruitful trips, including a lifetime subscription to Rosetta Stone.

item.title: Valve continues crackdown on Steam 'tourists' who switch countries for cheaper games
item.description: Valve is clamping down on Steam 'tourist' shoppers by limiting users to one country change every three months.

item.title: OnePlus Nord N200 5G review: A $240 5G phone that's predictably average
item.description: At $240, the OnePlus Nord N200 5G seems like a better buy than the Pixel 4a and iPhone SE. But OnePlus’ promises come with asterisks.

item.title: How to watch Microsoft's Windows 11 launch event
item.description: Microsoft is holding its Windows 11 launch event at 11AM Eastern — here's how to watch as it happens.

item.title: Apple's artist-themed Fitness+ workouts start this Monday
item.description: Apple is bringing its promised Artist Spotlight to Fitness+ this Monday, alongside a new season of Time To Walk episodes.

item.title: Google delays the rollout of its third-party cookie replacement to mid-2023
item.description: Google is pushing back its plan to phase out third-party cookies in Chrome as part of its Privacy sandbox changes.

item.title: What Neuralink and other BCIs can and can't do
item.description: Elon Musk's BCI startup wants to make people more than human by putting computers in their heads but a number of neurology researchers aren’t quite so bullish on these fantastical promises.

item.title: Google and Jio reveal a low-cost smartphone that's 'made for India'
item.description: Google has unveiled its first Android smartphone built jointly with Jio, the Indian mobile network it acquired a stake in last year.

item.title: Apple's AirPods Max fall to a new all-time low of $489 at Amazon
item.description: You can now pick up a pair of Apple's AirPods Max headphone from Amazon at $490, the lowest price we've seen yet.

item.title: This electronic fairy jar is a charming mix of Pokémon and Tamagotchi
item.description: WowWee's new LCD toy lets children amass a collection of colorful fairies in a jar.

item.title: New York City will get its first curbside EV chargers in October
item.description: New York City is expanding its electric vehicle charging infrastructure with the launch of 120 extra charging ports in October.
